sourcesContent:
export const translations = {
  en: {
    // Navigation
    'nav-home': 'Home',
    'nav-about': 'About',
    'nav-services': 'Services',
    'nav-testimonials': 'Testimonials',
    'nav-contact': 'Contact',
    'nav-book': 'Book Now',

    // Hero Section
    'hero-title': 'Professional Cleaning with a Human Touch',
    'hero-subtitle': 'Family-owned cleaning services in Marietta, Georgia. Trust, quality, and attention to detail in every job.',
    'hero-cta': 'Book a Free In-Home Evaluation',
    'hero-phone': '(866) 350-9407',

    // About Section
    'about-title': 'About Us',
    'about-subtitle': 'More than a cleaning company, we are a family taking care of your family.',
    'about-description': 'Santos Cleaning Solutions LLC is a professional cleaning company based in Marietta, Georgia, driven by faith, purpose, and dedication. We founded our company with a simple yet powerful mission: to offer cleaning services that go beyond the basics—delivering care, excellence, and that professional touch that transforms a house into a home.',

    // Services
    'services-title': 'Our Cleaning Services',
    'services-subtitle': 'Professional cleaning solutions tailored to your needs',
    'service-deep': 'Deep Cleaning',
    'service-regular': 'Regular Maintenance',
    'service-move': 'Move-In / Move-Out Cleaning',
    'service-appliance': 'Fridge & Oven Cleaning',
    'service-laundry': 'Laundry Services',
    'service-cabinet': 'Interior Cabinet Cleaning',

    // Reviews
    'reviews-title': 'What Our Clients Say',
    'reviews-subtitle': 'Real reviews from satisfied customers',
    'reviews-rating': 'Based on 47+ Google reviews',

export const useTranslations = (language = 'en') => {
  const t = (key) => {
    return translations[language]?.[key] || translations['en'][key] || key;
  };

  return { t };
};
